originalText.text: I was worried that the ledge underneath my window would completely prevent the installation of my AC unit after I hired a TaskRabbit and they told me it wasn’t going to work. Miraculously, Clarke was able to purchase new brackets in advance of my same day appointment and was able to install the unit in less than 45 minutes. Very thankful for this brilliant service.

originalText.text:
I found NYC Pigeon A/C after searching for an expert installer with the new Midea quiet window air conditioners.

The service I received was no less than comparable to the many excellent reviews I read prior.  Clarke was exceptionally warm and friendly, as well as efficient and focused on the task at hand.

The whole process was quick, pleasant, clean and resulted in the unit being installed perfectly.

He services other brands as well. I would definitely use him again and refer him to friends and family.

Don't look any further!

Thank you.

text.text:
I found NYC Pigeon A/C after searching for an expert installer with the new Midea quiet window air conditioners.

The service I received was no less than comparable to the many excellent reviews I read prior.  Clarke was exceptionally warm and friendly, as well as efficient and focused on the task at hand.

The whole process was quick, pleasant, clean and resulted in the unit being installed perfectly.

He services other brands as well. I would definitely use him again and refer him to friends and family.

Don't look any further!

Thank you.

originalText.text:
EDIT: Unfortunately, I have to retract my initial 5-star review.

After Clarke did an excellent job with installing two Midea U-shaped units, I asked him to come by a few weeks later to install a third. This installation did not go as smoothly. The unit was installed at an improper angle, which caused rainwater to be funneled through the unit into the bedroom. This was extremely problematic, as the amount of water coming in during heavy rains was quite large.

Clarke initially said he would come by to take a look, but then ghosted me. It was been nearly two months and he still will not respond to my text messages despite making posts on social media. I had to hire another person, who was able to come over quickly, confirm that installation error was causing the problem, and correctly re-install the unit.

Unfortunately, I had to pay an additional $150 to correct Clarke's initial mistake. If Clarke continues to ignore me and my request for reimbursement to correct his installation error, I will be taking him to small claims court.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:
Clarke can call himself Clarke Kent because he is the Superman of air-conditioner installation. I had no idea a person could work this fast. Installing two new U-shaped Midea units + removing two old units in ONE HOUR. Picture perfect professional; he also wore plastic covers over his workboots, which I greatly appreciated because we don't wear shoes indoors. Haven't seen customer service this good since I left Japan. 10 stars!!

originalText.text:
I found NYC Pigeon Air Conditioner through a simple Google Maps Search and decided to book them for our window ac unit installation based on the many positive reviews.

Email communication ahead of our appointment was very smooth and easy. We had no problems at all.

For our first appointment Clarke installed the Hisense 8000 BTU model. He was very polite, professional and gave us a lot of advice on the appropriate models for our apartment. The installation was very quick and clean. We tested out the model for a week before we decided to remove it and install the Midea U-shape model which Clarke had recommended for us based on our needs. So we asked him to return for a second visit. Again, the scheduling went very smoothly with their new online scheduling calendar. On our second visit he removed the model he had initially installed and installed the new model for us. Again, very quickly and cleanly.

Overall we are super satisfied with the installation and will recommend the company to friends and family!
